oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Thanksgiving dinner at the Davidson County Court House, Mayor Briley’s Conference Room, 1972 November 22
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A view of a Thanksgiving dinner at the Davidson County Court House in Mayor Briley’s Conference Room, Nashville, Tennessee, November 22, 1972. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 2.5 x 2.5 in.
